titles.title: I have walked alone with Jesus

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: I have walked alone with Jesus In a fellowship divine. Never more can earth allure me, I am His and He is mine.

verse.name: c1
v2
verse.lines: On the mountain I have seen Him, Christ my Comforter and Friend And the glory of His presence Will be with me to the end.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: In my failure, sin, and sorrow, Broken-hearted, crushed and torn, I have felt His presence near me, He has all my burdens borne.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: In the darkness, in the shadow, With the Saviour I have trod, Sweet indeed have been the lessons Since Iâ€™ve walked alone with God.
